mapper.sql: id, msg_info, create_date, create_by, entity_id, room_nbr, phone, gname
mapper.insert: insert into pg_msg_log (id, msg_info, create_date, create_by, entity_id, room_nbr, phone, gname) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{msgInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gname,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into pg_msg_log
id,
msg_info,
create_date,
create_by,
entity_id,
room_nbr,
phone,
gname,

mapper.update:
update pg_msg_log
msg_info = #{msgInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
entity_id = #{entityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
room_nbr = #{roomNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gname = #{gname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pg_msg_log set msg_info = #{msgInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, entity_id = #{entityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, room_nbr = #{roomNbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gname = #{gname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT * from pg_msg_log pm where pm.entity_id =#{entityId}
and pm.gname like '%${gname}%'
and pm.phone like '%${phone}%'
ORDER BY pm.id DESC
